ingredients: 1 (14.1 ounce) package pastry for a 9-inch double-crust pie,   +   3/4 cup white sugar, or more to taste, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 6 cups thinly sliced apples, 1 tablespoon butter
nutrition: Total Fat 9g 12%, Saturated Fat 3g 14%, Cholesterol 4mg 1%, Sodium 128mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 42g 15%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 29g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 4mg 22%, Calcium 11mg 1%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 117mg 2%
